title: Chess 2 The Sequel
description: Chess 2: The Sequel is the next step in the evolution of chess tuned for more viable options, strategic interest, and years and years of expert play. If you cross the midline of the board with your king (midline invasion), you win. This makes for faster, more dynamic , and more aggressive games while eliminating the draw problem that plagues high-level chess. Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate

system_requirements.Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 or better
